comments.raw_text:
I updated the patch to NSS 3.13 and made the following changes:

1. The default of the SSL_ENABLE_OB_CERTS option should be PR_FALSE.

2. Change the TLS extension number to 13175.
comments.author: wtc@google.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 565402
Patch v2

I updated the patch to NSS 3.13 and made the following changes:

1. The default of the SSL_ENABLE_OB_CERTS option should be PR_FALSE.

2. Change the TLS extension number to 13175.
comments.creator: wtc@google.com

comments.raw_text:

A current copy of the draft should be found and attached to this bug report 
for posterity.

comments.raw_text:
The Internet-Draft has been submitted to IETF.  The URL is
http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-balfanz-tls-obc-00.

Since then, we've changed the extension number from 0xff0f
to 13175.
comments.creator: wtc@google.com
